data.title: TEACHER ZEYNEP
data.meta_description: When I was working Devrekani Yunus Emre İlkokulu. I have projects which have Europen Quality Label.
data.text:
Coding Masters Throughout The School Year

​eTwinning Project​​

This is a school -year long project. It is dedicated to a grup of 6-7 year olds. it involves English language learning, basic knowledge about nature and seasons and coding. Each month students will get tasks to be done. Project partners will create taskas for each other. teachers will be using coding matts, ICT, internet applications. The project will be evaluated in April or May. ​

Nature Protectors eTwinning Project

​Our project; It is designed to raise awareness in our students about environmental pollution and its causes and to provide solutions for the future.

Our project; because our students are small in age; activities will be designed in their own language, but teachers will translate.

Write, illustrate and publish eTwinning Project

It is intended to develop skills related to the writing and illustration of stories created by students and subsequent publication in paper and digital format.

The work of writing and illustration will be developed in partnership, involving the circulation of the work by electronic mail or in folders stored in the cloud.

The final papers may be published in different languages, depending on the partners involved.

The publications can be publish in videos or digital presentations.

Let's Celebrate With A Healty Food eTwinning Project

The main goal of this project is to promote a healthy lifestyle among children and to help students understand and distribute the information about healthy food like fruit and vegetables. The students will make some fruit salad or another dishes with vegetables. They will learn to work together. They will not only get to know the differences between cultures but also they will come to terms with the similarities about the healthy food or activity in many country of Europe. They will get know what they can eat instead of product with sugar and fat.

​

Kind Is Better eTwinning Project

When children begin to interact with their environment, they sometimes exhibit undesirable behaviors. Our goal in the project is to enable and encourage students to put themselves in others' shoes, both human beings and living beings, gaining greater awareness about the importance of proper behaviors. Most activities will be based on a collaborative use of the IT. The project also will involve teachers and student's families. Partners will use both English and their own language.
